TEXT.TITLE: FRANCE SETS 9.5 BILLION FRANC T-BILL TENDER
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of France said it will offer 9.5 billion francs worth of negotiable Treasury bills at its next weekly tender on April 13. The total includes four billion francs worth of 13-week bills, 2.5 billion francs of two-year bills and three billion francs of five-year bills. At this week's tender on Monday the Bank sold a total of 7.7 billion francs worth of 13 and 26-week bills against an original offer of seven billion and demand for 22.66 billion. REUTER
